text:
Hello!
Has anyone else been experiencing issues with `hs project dev`? It seems like changes to my code are not being picked up on save. This has been happening across multiple projects, so I created a new one using the 'CRM getting started project with private apps' to make sure it wasn't some dependency issue on my end. Even with a fresh project I am getting the following errors while developing locally.
